channel.title: Client error - help?
channel.description:
Hi Every Time i run my client to try and get onto my server it logs me in for about 1-2 secs and then logs me out instantly and this is the error i get on the client Code:
[code]Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection [/code]
Note: Im Currently Using Ddspeced source/Delta and im usin Bluurs Client
Help Will Be Appriciated Thanks [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2009, 07:11:49 pm[/size][hr]WOW SO NO ONE KNOWS THIS ERROR? WHY DONT NO ONE REPLY WOW FFS
